我真的曹飞你妈个大龙臭黑逼，我开开心心拿个四杀智斗人皇欢乐退出，结果尼玛个傻逼给我报错把我的紫色祭品直接你妈逼整没，你爹的血点也没加，你妈个垃圾傻逼脑残弱智沾了点智障的垃圾官方早早去你妈的黄泉去报你妈的到吧，臭鸡巴垃圾

游戏是好游戏，但是有些恶心人的玩家，那些跟屠夫溜的人，溜可以，你厉害，遛一遛不会玩的新手，但是你拿个手电在那里嘲讽就很过分了，谁不是从新手过来的，你肯定也被大佬溜过，也曾在学习溜的时候被大佬无情砍倒，但是你拿个手电在那里晃来晃去什么意思？以为你自己很牛逼？最有意思的是被我砍到了还直接退出游戏了？玩不起就别玩OK？你是个der啊？就这素质玩你妈的游戏，傻逼玩意

Açık söylemek gerekirse, ilk kez bir inceleme olarak bireysel fikrimi yazıyorum. Oyun çok eğlenceli. İster arkadaşınız olsun,ister olmasın solo dahi oynarsınız keyif alabilirsiniz. Oyunun 59 TL olması fazla baya zam gelmiş. Bazılarına göre değer,bazılarına göre değmez tamamen kişisel meseledir.  Sonuç olarak tek de olsanız,arkadaşlarınız da olsa eğleniyorsunuz..

I really like this game. It's really fun. I think there should be punishment for people that disconnect though. It's just unsportsmanlike conduct, and really throws the whole game off. It's not fair to your teammates. It's a game, it's meant to be fun.

Je recommande Dead by daylight aux joueurs qui aiment l'action, l'horreur. C'est un jeu qui cherche constament à évoluer et de nouvelles maj sont souvent faites, les joueurs sont très écoutés par les développeurs et la communauté est comprise. Je jouais à ce jeu sur ps4 depuis 2ans, et je suis maintenant sur pc, je ne suis pas déçue ! 

(hi my engish readers) i recommend Dead by daylight to the players who likes fun, action and horror. This game always evolve and updates are often made, players are listened by the developers and the community is understood. I played to dbd on ps4 since 2years, i am now on pc and i am absolutely not disappointed !

En este programa… Paulina está cansada pero nos da una verdadera masterclass de cómo hacer panqueques.
Qué tal amiguísimos de Paulina Cocina. Pueden creer que en una web tan completa no teníamos la receta de panqueques? Pues sí, nuestros internautas no saben cómo hacerlos, por eso nos los piden a gritos. Y por eso la Paulina de la gente se pone las pilas y hace una verdadera masterclass de cómo hacer panqueques o crepes, con todos los trucos para que te queden perfectos, porque nunca es tarde para intentarlo en casa.

Por si esto fuera poco nos comimos el panqueque de nuestras vidas, que fue un panqueque con dulce de leche, por supuesto, porque así se hacen tradicionalmente. Si usted no es argentino y no ha probado el dulce de leche le recomiendo que aproveche este mismo momento para intentar conseguir un frasco de este manjar, esta receta de panqueques es la excusa perfecta para descubrir el sabor magistral de éste dulce.

Y si usted si es argentino yo no tengo mucho para decirle. Que este es un clásico de  los clásicos. Tortas fritas, panqueques, pastelitos, entre los dulces argentinos que llevo en el corazón.

Sin más los dejo con la receta, les va a encantar.

¡Disfruten del video!

Hasta la próxima!
Отличная игра. Разработчики молодцы, постоянно добавляют новый контент, все время какие-то ивенты, уважение!

I didn't expect to enjoy this game at all but everyone was having so much fun that I thought I'd buy it. Immediately purchased the Ash vs Evil Dead pack, and a stunning summer holiday outfit for Ash (including hand puppet and socks with sandals), and jumped right in! The game is super fun and very addictive. I can't play killer due to 1st person giving me motion sickness but I enjoy survivor a lot so it's all good. Game is best played with friends in voice chat so that you can collaborate to some extent but still fun with randos. Definitely recommend and with the game being relatively inexpensive, I definitely suggest just giving it a go!

Прекрасная игра и шикарное комьюнити.
После каждой катки вы будете понимать что вы отстойный маньяк и выживший. А также вам будут приседать и писать что вы кемпер и туннелер, а также угрожать баном из-за этого. Если был бы войс чат в этой игре то это было бы подобие доты.
Оценка игре 10/10

At time of writing this review, I have 881 hours of gameplay on DOTA 2 and 536 hours on Rainbow Six Siege. Outside of that, I've played lots of Overwatch, and easily over a thousand hours of Call of Duty, balanced between MW2, BO1, MW3, BO2, and MW2019. I don't have a count of how many hours I've got on those (PS3), but suffice to say that I've had my fair share of internet toxicity. Dead By Daylight is the only time I've ever had it ruin a game for me, though.

PROS
+It's a really cool premise. Asymmetrical games are hard to pull off right, and the barebones of this are pretty good.
+Lots of cool original killers. The ideas behind many of these characters (especially Huntress and Spirit) are really well done and executed well.
+Licensed characters are generally well handled as far as concept goes. Often their playstyle is accurate for how the character should feel to go against (especially Michael Myers, Ghostface, and Pyramid Head).
+Plenty of the themes for licensed characters are really good at heightening the tension when you're hiding from them.
+Ashley Williams, voiced by the one and only Bruce Campbell! (That's right, that's me baby!)
+As far as games to play with your friends, this is really good. Not for you and three friends playing online, but for you and four friends in a custom game.

CONS
-The developers of this game have no idea on how to balance their game. One was quoted on stream as stating that Freddy Kreuger was overpowered, but admitting that he didn't know why. Instead of fixing Freddy's hitbox which gives his lunge attack outrageous range, they reduced the number of his dream snares by a small amount and slowed him when deploying them. I've played as Freddy before and after the nerf: there is no change to how I hunt and I'm still too effective when I play as him. Outside of this, useless killers are buffed into being overpowered and overpowered killers are nerfed into being useless.
-On another note, the developers don't care about the reports you make. Did you witness a player breaking the rules and report them in the post-game menu? Well, too bad! You need to report on their official website with screenshots! Did you report them on their website with screenshots? Well that's a shame! You need to report them in the postgame menu! Do you have recorded evidence of a player using hacks? Man, if only we cared!
-The inability to be able to balance the game properly means that the playerbase are the ones to make up their own rules for what's overpowered or not. And there's no consistency on this at all. Camping is OP, tunneling is OP, tapping gens is OP, running loops is OP, playing in a party is OP, running loops around terrain is OP, running circles around killers is OP, using any perk to run faster is OP, stunning the killer is OP, blinding the killer is OP. Many of these listed are literally in the game design. Many of these are just dumb moves that leave you open to lose the game. Outside of the two or three killers who were buffed to the point where unskilled players can regularly destroy highly-skilled players, there's only one thing that I honestly think is overpowered:
-Killer Perk "Hex: No One Escapes Death." I don't mind penalizing survivors for completing their objectives, there are many perks that do this well (for both killer and survivor). I don't mind crutch perks that help low-skilled killers get a kill or two so that they can feel like they had a successful game. I mind when the developers, in their attempt to make a perk like this, make something that literally gives away free kills like little gold star stickers off of a sheet from the dollar store. As someone who plays as both killer and survivor, it's not fun to play with (far too easy) and it's not fun to play against (if a killer sneezes on you, your teammates are leaving you for dead).
-Every time a major release occurs, the game is broken. For the last three DLC releases (Binding of Kin, All-Kill, Resident Evil), a major part of the game has been broken. On release, the Resident Evil map broke the game and had to be removed from the play roster, despite being solid in the beta. It took over a month before it was ready for release into public matchmaking, and even now there are still reports of people's games crashing from the map. It has since been removed again from public matchmaking.
-Useless anti-cheat. Lagswitchers prevent killers from stopping survivors from escaping, grabbing them off of generators, or placing them on hooks. Killers fly around the map on high at incredible speed throwing hatchets at the survivors down below like a Chopper Gunner rather than a lone killer.
-A progression system that needs to be significantly reworked. When the game released, the grind made sense to stretch out the content for the limited number of survivors and killers. There are 84 killer perks in the game, so that makes sense for a number of things to grind out to get one killer to "max level." But wait: all but 12 of these perks are unique to their given killers! In order to unlock these unique perks for universal use, you need to level those killers up to level 40, which costs between 800,000 and 900,000 bloodpoints (in a given game, you can expect between 15,000-25,000 before spending consumables to increase your score). And lest we forget: each perk has three different levels! So if you want them to actually be at max level, you need to effectively spend at least 19.2 million bloodpoints to unlock the perks, then the bloodpoints to put them on the character you want! All of this is before you prestige, too! And we're leaving out the 27 survivors, who have 95 perks in game (only 14 are universal)! I hope you like grinding away game after game, which is made far less fun because...
-Toxicity. Sheer ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ toxicity. As I said in my intro, I'm well experienced in toxicity. I've been called horrible things time after time after time in all sorts of games. It's a fact of online culture, and there's not much you can do about it. I accept that. But nothing reaches the cancerous levels that I've seen it get to in this game. And I'm not talking about the usual trash-talking after a game, I'm talking people actively ruining the game "just because". Did you work four generators by yourself while the rest of the team was playing musical chairs with the killer and his hook? Then you did nothing for the team and once you get hooked, you're as good as dead. Are you chasing a survivor? Expect other survivors to click their flashlights at you incessantly. Are you the last one in the game and were downed by the killer? Expect him to take you to an exit gate/hatch and watch you crawl close to it, only to pick you up and set you back again and again until you bleed out and die. Did you give a good show as a killer and get one or two kills? Expect the remaining survivors to teabag you and point at you to show that you couldn't get them because they're oh so better than you. Are hiding in a locker from a killer? Don't be surprised when another survivor comes and rats you out because that's how they get their kicks. Are you sitting in a corner waiting for the killer to pass so you can get out and start doing your job a? Well, another survivor is now blocking you, so you're trapped for the rest of the game. Or worse: the killer is standing there, blocking you from playing without killing you. Did you go into a game looking to have fun? Big mistake.
-A broken as heck chat filter. I've seen these before, and usually don't care about it one way or the other. But when you can't say words that are directly related to the game (down, pick up, kill, Jin, Myers) but can use direct profanity (a word that sounds like "ship"), you've messed up bad. And no, you can't turn off the filter, so have fun typing words out O. N. E. L. E. T. T. E. R. A. T. A. T. I. M. E. to communicate through the filter.

Save your breath, your time, and your money. Go get something less toxic, like League of Legends.

As the real Madeleine Mccann i can confirm this game is spot on and super realistic.
Many people wonder what happened to me on 3 May 2007. Well i was put in this game with a trash meg and bill (i've never seen someone who's good play ether of those two) and i've been here ever since.

If your a toxic little Gremlin then this is the game for you.
BUT if you get the game and get 100hrs and are still trash uninstall for the sake of the DBD community.
Awesome execution of a seemingly simple concept. It is clear that one would improve through more experience.

This game is solely for killers..... survivors have little chance of escaping and having points. The aim of the game to exit and when you do you have 0 point level as a rewards, this make no sense to me. Many players ragequit during a match and then other survivors become easier target as the killer only have to chase 3 players instead of 4. 

Many times over, i posted comments on all killers about being too strong. Every single game where the score is listed I post that i had no fun..... This game has a lot of potential....

I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME until they adjust the ratio between killers and survivors.....
